Attackdex

Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Arm Thrust 20 15 100 The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.
Aura Sphere 20 80 — The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body. This attack never misses.
Axe Kick 10 120 90 The user slams its heel into the target. It may confuse, but if it misses the user takes damage.
Battle of Wits 10 80 100 The user fights using its wits. This move's power scales with the user's Sp. Def stat.
Body Press 10 80 100 The user slams its body into the target. This move's power scales with the user's Defense.
Brick Break 15 75 100 The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen.
Bulk Up 20 — — The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.
Circle Throw 10 60 90 The target is thrown and switched. This ends a battle against a single wild Pokémon.
Close Combat 5 120 100 The user fights the target up close without guarding itself, lowering its defensive stats.
Coaching 10 — — he user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.
Collision Course 5 100 100 The user causes a prehistoric explosion. This move's power is boosted if supereffective.
Combat Terrain 10 — — For 5 turns, contact effects are more likely and Fighting type-moves are stronger.
Combat Torque 10 100 100 A dextrous spinning attack that may paralyze the foe.
Concussive Blast 10 80 100 The user focuses force in a narrow beam. This move deals physical damage.
Counter 20 — 100 A retaliation move that counters any physical hit with double the damage.
Cross Chop 5 100 80 The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.
Detect 5 — — Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
Double Kick 30 30 100 The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.
Drain Punch 10 75 100 An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
Dynamic Punch 5 100 50 The user punches the target with full power. This confuses the target if it hits.
Final Gambit 5 — 100 The user risks everything, fainting but inflicting damage equal to its HP.
Flying Press 10 100 95 The user dives down from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.
Focus Blast 5 120 70 The user unleashes power with heightened focus. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
Focus Punch 20 150 100 The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. It fails if the user is hit first.
Force Palm 10 60 100 The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
Hammer Arm 10 100 90 The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.
High Jump Kick 10 130 90 The target is hit with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.
Jump Kick 10 100 95 The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.
Karate Chop 25 50 100 The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.
Low Kick 20 — 100 A powerful low kick that inflicts greater damage on heavier targets.
Low Sweep 20 65 100 The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.
Mach Punch 30 40 100 The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.
Mat Block 15 — — Using a mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves.
Meteor Assault 5 150 100 The user attacks wildly with its thick leek but can't move on the next turn.
No Retreat 5 — — This move raises all the user's stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.
Octolock 15 — 100 The user prevents the target from fleeing, lowering its defensive stats every turn.
Power-Up Punch 20 40 100 Striking opponents makes the user's fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.
Quick Guard 15 — — The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.
Revenge 10 60 100 This attack move's power is doubled if the target has hurt the user in the same turn.
Reversal 15 — 100 An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.
Rock Smash 15 40 100 The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.
Rolling Kick 15 60 85 The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. This may also make the target flinch.
Sacred Sword 15 90 100 The user attacks by slicing with a long horn, ignoring the target's stat changes.
Secret Sword 10 85 100 The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained inside does physical damage.
Seismic Toss 20 — 100 A gravity-fed throw that inflicts damage matching the user's level.
Seismic Wave 10 85 90 Seismic waves crash into the target. This may cause it to flinch.
Sky Uppercut 15 85 90 The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.
Storm Throw 10 60 100 The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.
Submission 20 120 100 The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground, also damaging the user.
Superpower 5 120 100 The user attacks the target with great power but its Attack and Defense stats are lowered.
Thunderous Kick 10 90 100 The user overwhelms the target with an electrified kick. This also lowers its Defense stat.
Triple Arrows 10 90 100 The user fires three arrows. It lands critical hits more easily and may lower Def.
Triple Kick 10 10 90 A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each hit.
Upper Hand 15 65 100 Intercepts the target's priority move if it is using one, but fails otherwise.
Vacuum Wave 30 40 100 The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum. This move always goes first.
Victory Dance 10 0 — The user performs an intense dance to boost Attack, Defense, and Speed stats.
Vital Throw 10 70 — The user attacks last. In return, this throw move never misses.
Wake-Up Slap 10 70 100 This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.
War Chant 10 — 100 The user's war cry sharply raises its Speed stat and makes critical hits more likely.
